Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/23/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Traded from New York (Y) to San Diego on 4/18/1986 (Going to SD: CF Ken Griffey, P Kevin Tapani, P Bob Shirley, C Rick Dempsey. Going to NYY: LF Carmelo Martinez, P Mike Cook, P Mike Walters, C
Tom Brookens)...
Injured on 5/2/1988 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/12/1988, off Teddy Higuera (CIN)...
Earned first career win on 8/12/1988...
Injured on 4/15/1989 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1989, going 18-10, 3.52 ERA...
